```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
all <- read_csv('../data/!question/all_97_cor.csv')  %>% 
  rename(Protein_g = Proteing_g) %>% 
  mutate(Sodium_g = round(Sodium_mg/1000, 3)) %>% 
  select(-Sodium_mg)
 
#     
double_check <- all %>% 
  select(Food_NSC:Calories_kcal) %>%  
  distinct()  %>% 
  arrange(Food_NSC, Unit, Por_eaten) %>% 
  group_by(Food_NSC, Unit) %>% 
  slice(1)
  
```
